PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-11392011-09-29,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  EC,  PCA-OLD
ActCanada National Parks Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the National Historic Parks General Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the NATIONAL HISTORIC PARKS GENERAL REGULATIONS in order to (1) increase the transparency and fairness of authorizations issued under the National Historic Parks General Regulations by specifying criteria to guide the Superintendent in deciding whether to issue an authorization for certain activities; and, (2) remove gender-specific language
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0217 Publication Date: 2011-10-12
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the National Historic Parks General Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
precis: Regulations Amending the NATIONAL HISTORIC PARKS GENERAL REGULATIONS in order to (1) increase the transparency and fairness of authorizations issued under the National Historic Parks General Regulations by specifying criteria to guide the Superintendent in deciding whether to issue an authorization for certain activities; and, (2) remove gender-specific language
